name: Disable comments with Google authorship
author: Andon Ivanov

sections.description:
With this plugin you can disable comments with Google authorship link. This protect your blog from members who want to get article authorship.

When anybody insert Google authorship link in your URL field in post comment form, this plugin remove link and submit comment without URL.
sections.installation:
To install Disable comments with Google authorship, you can follow the next two steps:

  1. Upload disable-comments-google-authorship folder from zip archive to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Core of plugin Disable comments with Google authorship
